about_the_game:
BAFTA-nominated composer Kevin Penkin returns to Defender's Quest II, bringing his bold and original soundscapes to your ears. This 42 minute soundtrack of original music is a an absolute treat and we were honored and thrilled to be able to include it in our game. We hope you enjoy!

[Note: the current soundtrack uses the loops from the game directly, but Kevin is working on putting together non-looped versions that will sound better on their own - the soundtrack will be updated with those new files as soon as they are ready]
detailed_description:
BAFTA-nominated composer Kevin Penkin returns to Defender's Quest II, bringing his bold and original soundscapes to your ears. This 42 minute soundtrack of original music is a an absolute treat and we were honored and thrilled to be able to include it in our game. We hope you enjoy!

[Note: the current soundtrack uses the loops from the game directly, but Kevin is working on putting together non-looped versions that will sound better on their own - the soundtrack will be updated with those new files as soon as they are ready]
name: Defender's Quest 2: Mists of Ruin Soundtrack
short_description: BAFTA-nominated composer Kevin Penkin returns for Defender's Quest II's 42-minutes of original music.
